donor_name: MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL, FUNDS FOR THE MILLENNIUM PROMISE VILLAGES PROJECT("MV2s"), INITIATED IN PARTNERSHIP WITH COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY'S EARTH INSTITUTE, THE UN MILLENNIUM PRIJECT AND UNDP. FUNDS ARE PROVIDED BY INFIVIDUAL PRIVATE DONORS VIA MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL. MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL IS THE EXECUTING AGENT FOR THIS PROJECT.
outputs.output_descr:
Output (from Year 1 Annual report for Bonsaaso, Ghana)
1. Malaria and Bednets (Malaria Intervention) 
-Training on distribution and promoting the proper use of bed nets
-Training on the life cycle of mosquito and transmission of malaria

2. Harvests (Agricultural Intervention) 
-Increased production to eliminate hunger and malnutrition
-Training in improved maize and cowpea production and supply of QPM seeds
-Following training, farmers would know the area of their farms; conduct farming operations through land preparation, planting, weeding, etc.
-Training in improved methods of vegetable production
-Yield of major season maize nearly doubled from 2.2 tons/ha to 4.07 tons/ha

3. Children in Schools (Education Intervention)
-All kindergarten, primary and junior secondary schools have been identified in Bonasaaso MVP
-Teacher/pupil ratio improving
-Construction of separate toilet facilities for boys and girls
-Parents recognize the importance of education and are sending their children to school


4. Basic Clinical Services (Health Intervention)
-Efforts are being made to recruit additional medical staff
-MV project now supporting outreach antenatal service in MV1
-Integrated campaign to eliminate measles and polio and improve child health through additional Vitamin A consumption



5. Safe Water Points (Water Intervention)
-Identification of water agencies and institutions involved in water management in area
-Water Needs Assessment and identification of water sources in the village
-Development of Water and Sanitation committees

outputs.output_descr: Il s'agit d'un projet de développement dont l'objectif principal est l'atteinte des 8 objectifs du Millénaire pour le Développement dans les autres villages de la Communauté rurale de Léona- Senegal.

donor_name: MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL, FUNDS FOR THE MILLENNIUM PROMISE VILLAGES PROJECT("MV2s"), INITIATED IN PARTNERSHIP WITH COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY'S EARTH INSTITUTE, THE UN MILLENNIUM PRIJECT AND UNDP. FUNDS ARE PROVIDED BY INFIVIDUAL PRIVATE DONORS VIA MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL. MILLENNIUM VILLAGES INTERNATIONAL IS THE EXECUTING AGENT FOR THIS PROJECT.
outputs.output_descr: The Millennium Villages aims to establish a rigorous proof of concept for implementing the practical interventions needed to achieve MDGs in Rural Africa over a five years time frame. Based on $50 per person per year the project aims at improving people's lives with special emphasis to areas of Agriculture, Education, Health and Infrastructure.
